name: Accurate
definition: Your Attack Dice using these weapons increases by 1 size.

name: Ammo
definition: These arms fire projectiles, with a specific ammo capacity indicated. Once empty, reloading is imperative.

name: Arcane
definition: Adds +1 to Spell Dice.

name: Attached
definition: These are affixed to your limb, freeing a hand.

name: Awkward
definition: When used below a certain distance threshold, your Attack Dice using these weapons decreases by 2 sizes.

name: Brace
definition: Enemies approaching your weapon's range automatically suffer 1d4 Pierce damage.

name: Bulk
definition: Refers to the weight of armor or a shield, influencing penalties on related Action or Reaction Dice for physical activities while equipped. Also, each 2 points of Bulk reduces your movement by 1m and your accuracy with ranged weapons by 1. It also reduces spellcast incantation rolls by 1 per Bulk value.

name: Burst
definition: These enhance accuracy or damage by sacrificing ammo. For every extra ammo spent (based on the weapon's Burst value), you gain 1 Reroll of your Attack Dice or you gain +1d4 bonus to your Damage Dice.

name: Compact
definition: Compact weapons or equipment are small enough that they can share inventory space up to a limit but they all share the same Durability value.

name: Crit
definition: Critical damage capability, featuring additional dice and effects.

name: Defensive
definition: Your Defense Dice using these weapons increases by 1 size.

name: Disposable
definition: Destroyed after use.

name: Durability
definition: Represents an equipment's integrity. Each time you take damage, you can willingly consume a point of Durability to nullify 5 damage of any type. If Durability reaches 0, the equipment permanently breaks. Additionally, rolling a natural 1 with a weapon deducts a point of Durability, representing mishandling.

name: Explosive
definition: Roll additional damage dice for each maximum roll until a non-maximum result occurs. Additionally, when its Durability reaches 0, the equipment detonates and explodes.

name: Heavy
definition: Requires 4 Stamina to use or attack. The wielder also gains +1 bonus to Defense Dice.

name: Light
definition: Requires only 2 Stamina to use or attack.

name: Loud
definition: Firing disrupts stealth and alerts.

name: Malfunction
definition: A natural 1 on Attack Roll halts weapon, requiring 3 Stamina to repair.

name: Mitigation
definition: An armor's damage absorption capability. The number is the maximum damage an armor can absorb in a single hit. Surplus damage over this value is deducted from Health points. Blunt damage diminishes Mitigation permanently. Zero Mitigation breaks the armor.

name: Oil
definition: A vial can be applied to a blade (5 attacks), 5 pcs of arrows, or 5 grams of food.

name: Overheat
definition: Using Burst over the designated limit reduces Durability by 1.

name: One-Handed
definition: Wielded with one hand.

name: Precise
definition: Attack Dice rolling its maximum deals critical damage if it hits.

name: Range
definition: Projectiles fired at a specified distance. Attacks beyond range suffer Weakness.

name: Reach
definition: Melee weapons striking beyond 1 meter, range indicated.

name: Reload
definition: Reload speed varies; Stamina cost for full ammo replenishment is noted. Requires a free hand.

name: Returning
definition: Returns to your hand after an attack, unless a natural 1 occurs, in which case it lands 1 meter from the target.

name: Risky
definition: Your natural 1 Attack Dice knocks you down, but if it rolls maximum, the target is also knocked down.

name: Setup
definition: Unusable in combat, needing ample preparation.

name: Slot
definition: Determines how many spaces a piece of equipment occupies in your Inventory Slot.

name: Sneak
definition: Unaware targets hit with these automatically face critical hits. Does not make any sound.

name: Snipe
definition: This property allows weapons to engage targets at extreme distances beyond their normal range (based on a given value). Attacks made with the Snipe property do not suffer penalties for firing past the weapon's standard range. However, the Snipe property can only be used when not actively engaged in combat, as the hectic nature of battle makes lining up long-distance shots impractical.

name: Sole
definition: You can only equip one instance of this category at a time.

name: Thrown
definition: Hurlable to a specified range, as indicated.

name: Trap
definition: Attack upon activation, triggered by proximity or remote control.

name: Two-Handed
definition: Requires two hands to wield. The wielder also gains +1 bonus to Attack Dice.

name: Unarmed
definition: Considered Unarmed attacks.

name: Unique
definition: Multiple copies of this equipment’s effect do not stack.

name: Versatile
definition: Wieldable with one or two hands.

name: Blunt
definition: Lowers an armor's Mitigation value by 1 (permanently) if it deals 6+ damage.

name: Slice
definition: Inflicts double total damage to Health after armor mitigation.

name: Decay
definition: If at least 3 Health damage occurs, inflict Vulnerable to all damage (until healed, can stack).

name: Burn
definition: If at least 3 Health damage occurs, reduce maximum Health by 5 (until healed, can stack).

name: Frost
definition: If at least 3 Health damage occurs, reduce maximum Reflex by 1 (until healed, can stack).

name: Pierce
definition: Disregards a quarter of an armor’s Mitigation value (rounded down).

name: Pure
definition: Affects Health solely, bypassing armor and resistances (except Soak).

name: Shock
definition: If at least 3 Health damage occurs, reduce maximum Focus by 3 (until healed, can stack).

name: Toxic
definition: If at least 3 Health damage occurs, reduce maximum Stamina by 1 (until healed, cannot stack).

name: Absorption
definition: Convert damage to Health determined by a specific damage type.

name: Cover
definition: Hidden behind larger object, defense die increased by 1 size if partial cover, 3 sizes if greater cover.

name: Elevated
definition: Base die for ranged attacks increases by 1 size against targets below, and melee attacks deal Critical Damage when executed from a significant height difference.

name: Hidden
definition: Unseen and unheard by target. Increases all base die by 1 size.

name: Immunity
definition: Reduce damage to zero determined by a specific damage type.

name: Resilience
definition: The ability to make an opposing spellcaster have more difficulty in casting their spell against you based on a specific value added to the spellcaster’s Incantation Dice.

name: Resistance
definition: Reduce damage by half determined by a specific damage type.

name: Soak
definition: Functions as an extra set of Health points. When damaged, deduct from Soak before real Health points. Soak disregards Vulnerability. Multiple Soak sources don't stack; the highest value source replaces the rest.

name: Toughness
definition: Immune to a specific threshold of damage.

name: Bleed
definition: Suffer set Health loss per round. Stacks from different damage types.

name: Distracted
definition: Cannot use Focus.

name: Exposed
definition: Lowers defense dice by one size (d8 to d6, d6 to d4, etc.).

name: Flinched
definition: Cannot use Reflex and lose Momentum.

name: Hindered
definition: Lowers action and reaction dice by one size (d8 to d6, d6 to d4, etc.).

name: Impaired
definition: Lowers attack dice by one size (d8 to d6, d6 to d4, etc.).

name: Wet
definition: Reduces fire damage by half (round up), doubles shock and frost damage.

name: Blinded
definition: Lose attack roll bonuses, attack die decreased by 1 size.

name: Burned
definition: Your maximum Health drops by 5 until healed.

name: Chilled
definition: Your maximum Reflex drops by 1 until healed.

name: Corrode
definition: Lose set armor Mitigation, shield Durability, or weapon Durability each round.

name: Crippled
definition: Combat actions and abilities cost 1 extra Stamina.

name: Dazed
definition: Moving causes immediate knock down and loss of turn.

name: Deafened
definition: Lose defense and reaction roll bonuses, defense and reaction die decreased by 1 size.

name: Disabled
definition: Cannot willingly attack.

name: Fatigued
definition: Maximum stamina reduced to 2.

name: Flanked
definition: Engaged by two+ melee attackers, defense die decreased by 1 size against them.

name: Immobilized
definition: Cannot willingly move.

name: Poisoned
definition: Your maximum Stamina drops by 1 until healed.

name: Sapped
definition: Your maximum Focus drops by 3 until healed.

name: Silenced
definition: Lose ability to speak.

name: Slowed
definition: Move 1 meter per Stamina used.

name: Vulnerable
definition: Take 150% damage determined by a specific damage type.

name: Weakened
definition: Halved melee and bow damage (round down).

name: Asleep
definition: Unconscious state that can be awakened with damage, Blinded, Deafened, Unaware.

name: Drained
definition: Lose all Focus points.

name: Exhausted
definition: No Focus regeneration.

name: Knocked Down
definition: Grounded, melee attackers do critical hit damage against downed targets, Slowed.

name: Restrained
definition: Lowers all base die by 1 size, no spell gesticulation.

name: Rot
definition: Your Injury raises by 1 until healed.

name: Staggered
definition: Lose a turn, attacks against you increase their base die by 1 size.

name: Suppressed
definition: Cannot access Mana.

name: Unaware
definition: Automatically takes Critical Damage when hit.

name: Dying
definition: Reach 0 Health, lose 1d4 Health/round till -10 (dead).

name: Incapacitated
definition: Unable to act, attack, or defend for turns, attacks against you instantly hit and deal Critical Damage.
